title: Nieve/Slayer assignments
content:
Monster Amount Extended amt. Unlock requirement Alternative(s) Weight
Aberrant spectres 120-185 200-250 60 , 65 , completion of Priest in Peril Deviant spectres 6
Abyssal demons 120-185 200-250 85 , 85 , completion of Priest in Peril Abyssal sire, Greater abyssal demon 9
Adamant dragons 3-7 20-30 Completion of Dragon Slayer II None 2
Ankou 50-90 90-150 40 Dark Ankou 5
Aviansies 120-185 130-250 Unlocked the Watch the birdy ability via spending 80 Slayer reward points Kree'arra, Flight Kilisa, Flockleader Geerin, Wingman Skree, Reanimated aviansie 6
Basilisks 120-180 200-250 40 , unlocked the Basilocked ability via spending 80 Slayer reward points Basilisk Knight 6
Black demons 120-185 200-250 80 Demonic gorillas, Balfrug Kreeyath, Porazdir, Skotizo 9
Black dragons 10-20 40-60 80 , partial completion of Dragon Slayer I Baby black dragons, King Black Dragon, brutal black dragons ( 77 ) 6
Bloodveld 120-185 200-250 50 , 50 , completion of Priest in Peril Mutated Bloodveld 9
Blue dragons 120-185 N/A 65 , partial completion of Dragon Slayer I Baby blue dragons, brutal blue dragons, Vorkath 4
Boss[n 1] 3-35 N/A Unlocked the Like a boss ability via spending 200 Slayer reward points, as well as various requirements for specific bosses None 8
Brine rats 120-185 N/A 47 , 45 , partial completion of Olaf's Quest None 3
Cave horrors 120-180 200-250 58 , 85 , completion of Cabin Fever None 5
Cave kraken 100-120 150-200 87 , 80 , 50 Kraken 6
Dagannoth 120-185 N/A 75 , completion of Horror from the Deep Dagannoth spawn, Dagannoth fledgeling, Dagannoth Kings 8
Dark beasts 10-20 100-150 90 , 90 , partial completion of Mourning's End Part II None 5
Drakes 30-95 N/A 84 None 7
Dust devils 120-185 200-250 65 , 70 , partial completion of Desert Treasure None 6
Elves 60-90 N/A 70 , partial completion of Regicide Elf warrior, mourner (Mourner Headquarters), Guard (Prifddinas), Reanimated elf 4
Fire giants 120-185 N/A 65 None 9
Fossil Island Wyverns 5-60 55-75 66 , 60 , completion of Bone Voyage and Elemental Workshop I[n 2] Spitting, taloned and long-tailed wyvern ( 66 ), Ancient Wyvern ( 82 ) 5
Gargoyles 120-185 200-250 75 , 80 , completion of Priest in Peril Grotesque Guardians 6
Greater demons 120-185 150-200 75 K'ril Tsutsaroth, Tstanon Karlak, Skotizo 7
Hellhounds 120-185 N/A 75 Cerberus, Skeleton Hellhound, Greater Skeleton Hellhound 8
Iron dragons 30-60 60-100 80 , partial completion of Dragon Slayer I None 5
Kalphite 120-185 N/A 15 Kalphite worker, Kalphite soldier, Kalphite guardian, Kalphite Queen 9
Kurask 120-185 N/A 70 , 65 None 3
Lizardmen 90-120 N/A Unlocked the Reptile got ripped ability via spending 75 Slayer reward points, 5% Shayzien favour (unless killing them outside the Lizardman Canyon) Lizardman brute, Lizardman shaman[n 3] 8
Minions of Scabaras 30-60 130-170 85 , partial completion of Contact! Scarabs, scarab swarms, locust riders, scarab mages 4
Mithril dragons 4-9 20-40 Unlocked the I hope you mith me ability via spending 80 Slayer reward points, partial completion of Barbarian Training None 5
Mutated Zygomites 10-25 N/A 57 , 60 , completion of Lost City Ancient Zygomite 2
Nechryael 110-170 200-250 80 , 85 Greater Nechryael 7
Red dragons 30-80 N/A 68 , partial completion of Dragon Slayer I, unlocked the Seeing red ability via spending 50 Slayer reward points Baby red dragons, brutal red dragons 5
Rune dragons 3-6 30-60 Completion of Dragon Slayer II None 2
Skeletal Wyverns 5-15 50-70 72 , 70 , completion of Elemental Workshop I None 5
Smoke devils 120-185 N/A 93 , 85 Thermonuclear smoke devil 7
Spiritual creatures 120-185 180-250 63 , 60 , completion of Death Plateau, level 60 in or Spiritual ranger ( 63 ), warrior ( 68 ), mage ( 83 ) 6
Steel dragons 30-60 40-60 85 , partial completion of Dragon Slayer I None 5
Suqah 120-185 180-250 85 , partial completion of Lunar Diplomacy None 8
Trolls 120-185 N/A 60 Mountain troll, ice troll, Troll general 6
Turoth 120-185 N/A 55 , 60 None 3
TzHaar 110-180 N/A Unlocked the Hot stuff ability via spending 100 Slayer reward points TzTok-Jad[n 4], TzKal-Zuk[n 5] 10
Vampyres 110-170 200-250 Unlocked the Actual Vampyre Slayer ability via spending 80 Slayer reward points Feral Vampyre, Vampyre Juvinate, Vyrewatch, Vyrewatch Sentinel 6
Wyrms 80-145 N/A 62 None 7
Total task weight 262
  1. ↑ The odds of getting a specific task from the boss category is much smaller than getting a normal task, since there are two rolls for that task: one roll for the boss task, and one roll for the specific task within the boss category.
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 27 August 2020. (Archived from the original on 27 August 2020.) Mod Ash: "They do indeed require both of those. There isn't a limit on how many distinct requirements a task may have."
  3. ↑ 100% Shayzien favour is required to kill lizardman shamans.
  4. ↑ Players may be given a chance to slay TzTok-Jad, giving 25,000 bonus Slayer experience as well as any experience gained throughout the cave.
  5. ↑ Players may be given a chance to slay TzKal-Zuk, provided they have already killed it once before, giving 100,000 bonus Slayer experience as well as any experience gained throughout the Inferno.
rawContent:
<!-- Unlock Requirement sort value is in the format `{slayer req}{combat req}`
So an Aberrant Spectre has a sort value of `6065` because it has a 60 Slayer req and a 65 combat req.
A Crocodile only has a combat req of 50, so its sort value is `50`
Lizards have a slayer req of 22 with no combat req, so their sort value is `2200`, with the 0s at the end to make sure it sorts correctly-->
